com.nimiq

Interface NimiqClient


  • public interface NimiqClient
    This class allows to call RPC API of a Nimiq node.
    See Also:
    JSON RPC API, JsonRpcServer.js

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Account> accounts()
      Returns a list of addresses owned by client.
      int blockNumber()
      Returns the height of most recent block.
      ConsensusState consensus()
      Returns information on the current consensus stat.
      long constant(String name)
      Gets the value of the numerical constant.
      long constant(String name, Object value)
      Sets the value of the numerical constant.
      Wallet createAccount()
      Creates a new account and stores its private key in the client store.
      String createRawTransaction(OutgoingTransaction tx)
      Creates and signs a transaction without sending it.
      Account getAccount(String address)
      Returns details for the account of given address.
      long getBalance(String address)
      Returns the balance of the account of given address.
      Block getBlockByHash(String hash, boolean includeTransactions)
      Returns information about a block by hash.
      Block getBlockByNumber(int number, boolean includeTransactions)
      Returns information about a block by block number.
      BlockTemplate getBlockTemplate(String address, String extraData)
      Returns a template to build the next block for mining.
      Integer getBlockTransactionCountByHash(String hash)
      Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
      Integer getBlockTransactionCountByNumber(int number)
      Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.
      Transaction getRawTransactionInfo(String txHex)
      Deserializes raw bytes and returns information about a transaction.
      Transaction getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex(String hash, int index)
      Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.
      Transaction getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex(int number, int index)
      Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.
      Transaction getTransactionByHash(String hash)
      Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.
      TransactionReceipt getTransactionReceipt(String hash)
      Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.
      List<Transaction> getTransactionsByAddress(String address)
      Returns the latest transactions successfully performed by or for an address.
      List<Transaction> getTransactionsByAddress(String address, int limit)
      Returns the latest transactions successfully performed by or for an address.
      Work getWork(String address, String extraData)
      Returns instructions to mine the next block.
      int hashrate()
      Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.
      boolean log(String tag, String level)
      Sets the log level of the node.
      Mempool mempool()
      Returns information on the current mempool situation.
      List<Transaction> mempoolContent(boolean includeTransactions)
      Returns transactions that are currently in the mempool.
      String minerAddress()
      Returns the user friendly miner address.
      int minerThreads()
      Returns the number of CPU threads the miner is using.
      int minerThreads(int threads)
      Sets the number of CPU threads the miner is using.
      long minFeePerByte()
      Gets the current minimum fee per byte.
      long minFeePerByte(long minFeePerByte)
      Sets the minimum fee per byte.
      boolean mining()
      Returns true if client is actively mining new blocks.
      boolean mining(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the miner.
      int peerCount()
      Returns number of peers currently connected to the client.
      List<PeerInfo> peerList()
      Returns a list of peers known to the node.
      PeerInfo peerState(String address)
      Returns the state of the peer.
      PeerInfo peerState(String address, String command)
      Changes the state of the peer.
      String pool()
      Returns the current pool address.
      String pool(String pool)
      Set the new pool to switch to.
      long poolConfirmedBalance()
      Returns the miner balance confirmed by the pool.
      int poolConnectionState()
      Returns the pool connection state.
      String sendRawTransaction(String txHex)
      Sends a signed message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.
      String sendTransaction(OutgoingTransaction tx)
      Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.
      void submitBlock(String blockHex)
      Submits a block to the node.
      SyncStatus syncing()
      Returns an object with data about the sync status.

    • Method Detail

      • peerCount

        int peerCount()
        Returns number of peers currently connected to the client.
        Returns:
        the number of connected peers.

      • syncing

        SyncStatus syncing()
        Returns an object with data about the sync status.
        Returns:
        An object with sync status data

      • consensus

        ConsensusState consensus()
        Returns information on the current consensus stat.
        Returns:
        String describing the consensus state. "established" is the value for a good state, other values indicate bad state

      • peerList

        List<PeerInfo> peerList()
        Returns a list of peers known to the node.
        Returns:
        Array of peers

      • peerState

        PeerInfo peerState(String address)
        Returns the state of the peer.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of the peer
        Returns:
        The current peer state

      • peerState

        PeerInfo peerState(String address,
                   String command)
        Changes the state of the peer.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of the peer
        command - One of "connect", "disconnect", "ban", "unban"
        Returns:
        The new peer state

      • sendRawTransaction

        String sendRawTransaction(String txHex)
        Sends a signed message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.
        Parameters:
        txHex - The hex encoded signed transaction
        Returns:
        the Hex-encoded transaction hash.

      • createRawTransaction

        String createRawTransaction(OutgoingTransaction tx)
        Creates and signs a transaction without sending it. The transaction can then be send via sendRawTransaction without accidentally replaying it.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction object
        Returns:
        the Hex-encoded transaction.

      • sendTransaction

        String sendTransaction(OutgoingTransaction tx)
        Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction object
        Returns:
        the Hex-encoded transaction hash.

      • getRawTransactionInfo

        Transaction getRawTransactionInfo(String txHex)
        Deserializes raw bytes and returns information about a transaction.
        Parameters:
        txHex - Hex-encoded presentation of a transaction
        Returns:
        A transaction object

      • getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex

        Transaction getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex(String hash,
                                              int index)
        Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of the block containing the transaction
        index - Index of the transaction in the block
        Returns:
        A transaction object or null when no transaction was found.

      • getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex

        Transaction getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex(int number,
                                                int index)
        Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.
        Parameters:
        number - Height of the block containing the transaction
        index - Index of the transaction in the block
        Returns:
        A transaction object or null when no transaction was found.

      • getTransactionByHash

        Transaction getTransactionByHash(String hash)
        Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of a transaction
        Returns:
        A transaction object or null when no transaction was found.

      • getTransactionReceipt

        TransactionReceipt getTransactionReceipt(String hash)
        Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash. Note that the receipt is not available for pending transactions.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of a transaction
        Returns:
        A transaction receipt object, or null when no receipt was found

      • getTransactionsByAddress

        List<Transaction> getTransactionsByAddress(String address)
        Returns the latest transactions successfully performed by or for an address. That this information might change when blocks are rewinded on the local state due to forks.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of which transactions should be gathered.
        Returns:
        Array of transactions linked to the requested address. (up to 1000)

      • getTransactionsByAddress

        List<Transaction> getTransactionsByAddress(String address,
                                           int limit)
        Returns the latest transactions successfully performed by or for an address. That this information might change when blocks are rewinded on the local state due to forks.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of which transactions should be gathered.
        limit - Maximum number of transactions that shall be returned.
        Returns:
        Array of transactions linked to the requested address.

      • mempoolContent

        List<Transaction> mempoolContent(boolean includeTransactions)
        Returns transactions that are currently in the mempool.
        Parameters:
        includeTransactions - If true it returns the full transaction objects, if false only the hashes of the transactions.
        Returns:
        Array of transactions. Either represented by the transaction hash or a Transaction object.

      • mempool

        Mempool mempool()
        Returns information on the current mempool situation. This will provide an overview of the number of transactions sorted into buckets based on their fee per byte (in smallest unit).
        Returns:
        Mempool information

      • minFeePerByte

        long minFeePerByte()
        Gets the current minimum fee per byte.
        Returns:
        The current value

      • minFeePerByte

        long minFeePerByte(long minFeePerByte)
        Sets the minimum fee per byte.
        Parameters:
        minFeePerByte - The new value
        Returns:
        The new value

      • mining

        boolean mining()
        Returns true if client is actively mining new blocks.
        Returns:
        true if the client is mining, otherwise false.

      • mining

        boolean mining(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the miner.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to start the miner
        Returns:
        true if the client is mining, otherwise false.

      • hashrate

        int hashrate()
        Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.
        Returns:
        number of hashes per second.

      • minerThreads

        int minerThreads()
        Returns the number of CPU threads the miner is using.
        Returns:
        the current number of threads

      • minerThreads

        int minerThreads(int threads)
        Sets the number of CPU threads the miner is using.
        Parameters:
        threads - number of threads
        Returns:
        the new number of threads

      • minerAddress

        String minerAddress()
        Returns the user friendly miner address.
        Returns:
        the miner address

      • pool

        String pool()
        Returns the current pool address.
        Returns:
        pool address or null

      • pool

        String pool(String pool)
        Set the new pool to switch to.
        Parameters:
        pool - pool address
        Returns:
        the new pool address

      • poolConnectionState

        int poolConnectionState()
        Returns the pool connection state.
        Returns:
        the connection state: 0 - connected, 1 - connecting, 2 - closed

      • poolConfirmedBalance

        long poolConfirmedBalance()
        Returns the miner balance confirmed by the pool.
        Returns:
        the balance (in smallest unit)

      • getWork

        Work getWork(String address,
             String extraData)
        Returns instructions to mine the next block. This will consider pool instructions when connected to a pool.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to use as a miner for this block. This overrides the address provided during startup or from the pool.
        extraData - Hex-encoded value for the extra data field. This overrides the address provided during startup or from the pool.
        Returns:
        Mining work instructions

      • getBlockTemplate

        BlockTemplate getBlockTemplate(String address,
                               String extraData)
        Returns a template to build the next block for mining. This will consider pool instructions when connected to a pool.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to use as a miner for this block. This overrides the address provided during startup or from the pool.
        extraData - Hex-encoded value for the extra data field. This overrides the address provided during startup or from the pool.
        Returns:
        A block template object.

      • submitBlock

        void submitBlock(String blockHex)
        Submits a block to the node. When the block is valid, the node will forward it to other nodes in the network.
        Parameters:
        blockHex - Hex-encoded full block (including header, interlink and body). When submitting work from getWork, remember to include the suffix.

      • accounts

        List<Account> accounts()
        Returns a list of addresses owned by client.
        Returns:
        array of accounts owned by the client.

      • createAccount

        Wallet createAccount()
        Creates a new account and stores its private key in the client store.
        Returns:
        Information on the wallet that was created using the command.

      • getBalance

        long getBalance(String address)
        Returns the balance of the account of given address.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to check for balance.
        Returns:
        The current balance at the specified address (in smallest unit).

      • getAccount

        Account getAccount(String address)
        Returns details for the account of given address.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of the account.
        Returns:
        Details about the account. Returns the default empty basic account for non-existing accounts.

      • blockNumber

        int blockNumber()
        Returns the height of most recent block.
        Returns:
        The current block height the client is on.

      • getBlockTransactionCountByHash

        Integer getBlockTransactionCountByHash(String hash)
        Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of the block.
        Returns:
        Number of transactions in the block found, or null, when no block was found.

      • getBlockTransactionCountByNumber

        Integer getBlockTransactionCountByNumber(int number)
        Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.
        Parameters:
        number - Height of the block.
        Returns:
        Number of transactions in the block found, or null, when no block was found.

      • getBlockByHash

        Block getBlockByHash(String hash,
                     boolean includeTransactions)
        Returns information about a block by hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash of the block to gather information on.
        includeTransactions - If true it returns the full transaction objects, if false only the hashes of the transactions.
        Returns:
        A block object or null when no block was found.

      • getBlockByNumber

        Block getBlockByNumber(int number,
                       boolean includeTransactions)
        Returns information about a block by block number.
        Parameters:
        number - The height of the block to gather information on.
        includeTransactions - If true it returns the full transaction objects, if false only the hashes of the transactions.
        Returns:
        A block object or null when no block was found.

      • constant

        long constant(String name)
        Gets the value of the numerical constant.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the constant
        Returns:
        The current value of the constant

      • constant

        long constant(String name,
              Object value)
        Sets the value of the numerical constant.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the constant
        value - Either a numerical value or "reset" to set a default value
        Returns:
        The new value of the constant

      • log

        boolean log(String tag,
            String level)
        Sets the log level of the node.
        Parameters:
        tag - If '*' the log level is set globally, otherwise the log level is applied only on this tag.
        level - Minimum log level to display. (Valid options: trace, verbose, debug, info, warn, error, assert)
        Returns:
        True if the log level was set.
